p_Name: Violet-C Brightening Serum 20% Vitamin C + 10% AHA
p_description: What it is: A 20 percent vitamin C and 10 percent AHA serum with pure ingredients and gentle strength that helps soften, smooth, and brighten for more radiant, even-toned skin. Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dark Spots Formulation: Lightweight Serum Highlighted Ingredients: - Unique 20% Vitamin C Blend: A fast-acting, moisturizing vitamin C derivative absorbs quickly into skin to fight aging from daily free radical assault; helps support surface cell turnover for firmer looking skin while also improving moisture levels; remains in skin longer, helping to protect skin from oxidation and reduce UV damage for brighter skin over time. - Mild Fruit AHAs 10%: Gentle yet effective acids remove debris and the buildup of dead skin cells for smooth, radiant skin; derived from seven fruits (apple, grapefruit, orange, lemon, lime, hawthorn, and jujube). - Japanese Angelica Root Extract: An edible plant prized for centuries in herbal medicine for its recovery benefits, it helps reduce the appearance of dark spots, discoloration and post-acne scarring from the source; helps to diffuse accumulated excess melanin, a cause of hyperpigmentation, resulting in visibly more even skin tone. Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and free of gluten, silicone, oil, and fragrance. It comes in recyclable packaging. What Else You Need to Know: This clean, kind-to-skin formula with two types of vitamin C stabilized by antioxidant-rich Japanese beautyberry helps reveal a translucent, youthful glow. Mild fruit AHAs resurface dull, uneven skin, while Japanese angelica root helps to reduce the look of dark spots and post-acne scarring. Clinical Results: Based on an expert grade study of 20 women: - In 1 week, see smoother, more radiant skin - In 4 weeks, see a visible improvement in overall skin tone - In 8 weeks, see an improvement in skin texture and the appearance of fine lines Clean at Sephora When you spot our Clean seal, you can be sure we’ve checked that this brand’s product is made without the ingredients you told us you’d most like to avoid. Clean at Sephora™ is formulated without: Sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban. All skincare, hair, and makeup brands with the Clean Seal have less than one percent of synthetic fragrances.

Which skin type is it good for? ✔ Normal ✔ Oily ✔ Combination ✔ Dry ✔ Sensitive What it is: A must-have duo that delivers a daily dose of vitamins for your skin. Drunk Elephant's formulations are bio-compatible or, in other words, able to easily penetrate your skin, without disrupting its balance. C-Firma™: C-Firma™ has a reservoir effect, which means it will stay active on skin for up to 72 hours and cannot be washed or rubbed off. C-Firma™ has a pH level of 3.3, which Drunk Elephant believes is the key to a non-irritating, effective formulation that delivers real results. Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the skin’s health or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulations. They never take into account an ingredient’s synthetic or natural status, but instead choose based on its biocompatibility. You won’t find what Drunk Elephant calls the "Suspicious 6" in their products (essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical screens, fragrance/dyes, and SLS,) making them, in their opinion, appropriate for all skin. They believe that these six ubiquitous ingredients are at the root of almost every skin issue we see. When formulating the products, they focus on pH levels and safety, always making sure that the active ingredients are at efficacious levels. This is the Drunk Elephant difference.Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and cruelty-free.

To achieve luminous skin, it is vital to protect the skin against harsh free-radical damage. Free radicals are highly reactive chemicals produced by UVA and UVB rays, pollution, sun, and smoking that have the ability to damage the structure of all living cells, leading to premature aging. Topical antioxidants help the skin to protect itself against these harmful chemicals. Plankton extract is known for its cell metabolism benefits. To achieve luminous skin, it is also vital to boost cell energy, so skin cells are always performing at their optimal level. It is the ideal companion to any of our moisturizers (Double-Duty Face Moisturizer SPF 20, Clean Break Oil-Free Moisturizer, Dry Erase Ultra-Calming Face Cream, or Line Smoother 8% Glycolic Acid Treatment) or Post Shave Cooling Gel. Peptides are chains of amino acids (the building blocks of protein) that are essential to human life. They function as messengers in the skin, allowing the epidermis and dermis to communicate more efficiently. As we age, communication diminishes within the skin resulting in fine lines, wrinkles, and loss of elasticity. Peptides improve cell communication by sending specific signals that affect skin's response.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without fragrance and colorant.

Day after day, it improves the appearance of pores and spots, revealing perfectly refined, even skin. What else you need to know:The exceptional brightening power of the Edelweiss from Dior Gardens. Skin evenness and color are determined by a pigment known as melanin. With aging and repeated sunlight exposure, the undesirable sallow color of melanin spreads all over the skin, altering its evenness. Over time, melanin also becomes darker, damaging the natural skin color. Dior researchers have discovered that Edelweiss extract from the Dior Gardens in Switzerland interferes in this process and can diminish, correct, and prevent the creation of dark spots. Preventive action against spots is one of the most effective ways to achieve lasting efficacy on skin evenness and color correction.Edelweiss is cultivated at the heart of the Valais Garden in Switzerland at an altitude of 1,100 m. In this beautiful but hostile environment, temperatures can drop until -10°C while UV intensity is extreme, heavily reflected by the eternal snows. All the conditions are gathered for Edelweiss to develop the finest flowers, naturally and in the greatest respect of the environment Research results:In a self-assessment on 60 women after 1 month of use:- 100% said the skin is more luminous - 98% said the skin is more radiant- 95% said the skin is hydrated- 98% said the skin is suppler

p_Name: Golden Krocus Ageless Saffron Elixir Serum
p_description: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is:A precious golden elixir infused with the immense antioxidant power of one-day fresh Greek saffron to universally correct all visible signs of aging. Solutions for:- Fine lines/wrinkles- Uneven skin tone and discoloration - Loss of firmness/elasticity If you want to know more…In the Greek town of Kozani, lush krocus flowers bloom only once per year and produce the highest quality organic saffron in the world-a potent spice more precious than gold. Korres extracts the full power of this hand-picked, one-day fresh saffron at its maximum antioxidant levels and combines it with beta-glucans, peptides, and amino acids to create this elixir that strengthens skin’s resistance to daily damage. A complex of amino acids, polysaccharides, and copper helps to visibly firm and lift skin while reducing the appearance of wrinkles, and low molecular weight hyaluronic acid helps skin look smoother, plumper, and brighter. Much more than your typical serum, this universal and powerful booster helps to correct all visible signs of aging for all skin types and concerns. Experience a few golden drops every day for youthful-looking, glowing skin. What else you need to know:It takes 70,000 krocus flowers-which bloom only once per year for two weeks-to produce just one pound of Greek saffron. Each flower is hand-picked and the three delicate red saffron stigmas are hand-separated to preserve the potent antioxidant properties of this rare and precious spice. The unused parts of the flowers are returned to soil as organic fertilizer for the following year’s harvest, making this a zero waste, sustainable operation. The elixir is 94.9 percent natural and like all Korres formulations, it is made without petrolatum, mineral oil, silicones, propylene glycol, and ethanolamines. It is formulated without dye, fragrance, and gluten. Wild harvested in the remote Australian Kimberley and NW Territory, kakadu plum puts the “super” in super fruit. Ounce per ounce, kakadu plums contain on average 55 times the vitamin C of Florida oranges.* *A fresh kakadu plum contains on average 2500mg/100g WW of vitamin C vs. a Florida orange, which contains 45mg/100g WW. Based upon data calculated from Food Chemistry (Nov. 2013) and the US Department of Agriculture (March 2014). The kakadu plum included in the product has been combined with stabilized vitamin C from other sources. Note that the vitamin content of natural foods are estimates and vary depending upon conditions such as soil, temperature, and climate. Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is: An intensive age-defying treatment with three different growth factors; EGF, IL-1a, and KGF-naturally occurring in human skin-specifically formulated as a highly concentrated boost to regular anti-aging skincare.Solutions for: - Fine lines and wrinkles - Loss of firmness and elasticity - Dullness and uneven texture If you want to know more…From birth until adulthood, our bodies manufacture copious amounts of proteins called growth factors that communicate with cells, sending messages to repair, rejuvenate and so on. When we reach maturity, production of growth factors diminishes. As a result, cell turnover and repair slows, eventually affecting our appearance. This triple-action age-defying treatment is BIOEFFECT’s most potent formula and the first and only skincare product to contain three different types of growth factors that work together in harmony to maximize efficacy: IL-1a (interleukin 1A) increases skin’s elasticity and maintains the skin's barrier function; KGF (Keratinocyte Growth Factor) increases density and visibly diminishes wrinkles and fine lines; and EGF (Epidermal Growth Factor) supports the production of collagen and elastin as well as increasing the skin’s capacity to store water. Increased potency means more profound results, making this unparalleled in skincare repair. It maximizes hydration, tone, and radiance while visibly minimizing wrinkles, pore size, and redness. What else you need to know:This treatment contains only nine ingredients; no preservatives or additives. Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is:A powerful age-defying serum that visibly minimizes fine lines and wrinkles, rejuvenates the skin’s complexion, and restores its youthful radiance, as well as delivering hydration. Solutions for: - Fine lines and wrinkles - Loss of firmness and elasticity - Dullness and uneven texture If you want to know more…This award-winning, bestselling serum replenishes the body’s own natural supply of EGF (Epidermal Growth Factor) and rejuvenates skin cells, thus helping to slow the aging process. From birth until adulthood, our bodies manufacture copious amounts of proteins called growth factors that communicate with cells, sending messages to repair, rejuvenate, and so on. EGF is one of the most important growth factor for skin cells, helping them to boost production of collagen and elastin and increase the skin’s capacity to retain water to maintain healthy, youthful and dense skin. When we reach maturity, production of growth factors diminishes. As a result, cell turnover and repair slows, eventually affecting our appearance. In fact, skin density thins by one percent each year after we turn twenty, and it is further reduced by up to 30 percent during menopause. Skin starts to sag and fine lines and wrinkles appear. There are many factors that play a role in skin aging and some are beyond our control, like genetics. We can, however, lead a healthy lifestyle, protect our skin from the sun, and use effective anti-aging skincare products. What else you need to know: This serum contains only seven ingredients; no preservatives or additives. The bottle may be small but the serum inside is incredibly potent and long-lasting. You only need two to four drops per nighttime use to see visible, lasting results. The barley-based EGF is uniquely pure and grown in an ecologically-engineered greenhouse in Iceland with a negative CO2 footprint. Research results:An independent scientific double-blind split-face study, that included 29 women using Cellular Age-Defying Serum twice, daily for 2 months demonstrated: - 60% increase in skin thickness - 30% increase in skin density

p_Name: R45 The Reversal 3-Phase Retinol Booster System
p_description: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is:An award-winning, patented skincare booster system that is clinically proven to repair skin spots, wrinkles, pores, and skin tone unevenness in one 45-day treatment. Solutions for: - Fine lines and wrinkles - Loss of firmness and elasticity - Dullness and uneven texture If you want to know more… In a clinical study using facial skin scan analysis, R45 The Reversal achieved an unprecedented 49.5 percent reduction in the appearance of fine lines and deep mechanical wrinkles after one 45-day treatment. Its patented three-phase booster system breaks through the result plateaus other products encounter, allowing your skin to access concentrations of active ingredients at clinical levels never before possible. Proprietary TriGLO™ retinol regeneration complex and growth factor stimulant (GFS) serum combine during application to work synergistically in skin. Push your skin to achieve visible, lasting results with R45 The Reversal, a system so powerful you only need to use it two to three times a year. Concentrations of the deep-release retinol complex increase from Phase 1 to Phase 2 to Phase 3, allowing even the most sensitive skin to adjust without side effects while awaking skin's sleeping giants with each step-up phase for clinically tested and proven reduction in the appearance of wrinkles, skin tone unevenness, and pore size. This set contains:- 2 x 0.17 oz/ 15 mL Phase 1 - 2 x 0.17 oz/ 15 mL Phase 2 - 2 x 0.17 oz/ 15 mL Phase 3 What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates What else you need to know:Additional features: - Housed in airless containers for maximum performance from the lab to your bathroom. - Your retinol should be yellow. If an over-the-counter retinol claims to have retinol and isn’t yellow, it doesn’t contain enough of this key active to work. Watch how the yellow color of Phase 1 Retinol Regeneration Complex deepens from Phase 1 to Phase 2 to Phase 3. - Do not skip directly to Phase 3. Retinol is cumulative in the skin. Jumping to Phase 3 doesn’t allow each phase of retinol to build in the skin for best long-term results and a touch up treatment will be required. "R45 is our number one selling, award-winning skincare treatment and a total game changer. 10 out of 10 dermatologists use and will recommend retinoic acid (a form of retinol) for wrinkle reduction. The only problem with this active is it’s incredibly harsh on the skin because it was originally developed for acne and only by chance was discovered to have this incredible side effect of wrinkle reduction. I myself couldn’t use prescriptive retinol, but I knew the incredible benefits and set out on a mission. We knew the retinol ingredients that existed weren’t good enough, so we literally created a new molecule and called her TriGLO®. She is the first ever complex to mimic the skin-smoothing benefits of clinical retinol without the harsh side effects. After almost five years of testing and hundreds of revisions later, we have created the first-ever high-performance retinol every skin type can use. I recommend starting to boost at least twice a year after the age of 30 and once a year from 20 to 30. And PS-your retinol should be yellow (it’s almost turmeric yellow in its raw form). If your over the counter retinol isn’t yellow, there probably isn’t enough in there to do much of anything. Watch how Phase 1 is a golden yellow and transitions to a deep yellow in Phase 3. I usually do a boost in spring and one again in the fall before the holidays."-Jamie O’Banion, Founder R45 The Reversal is formulated without mineral oil, silicone, and fragrance.

This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know: A viable alternative to hydroquinone, this pro-level treatment fights discoloration by removing over-pigmented surface cells, brightening skin tone, and fighting against environmental aggressors. Skin brightness improves in as early as two weeks, while diminishing visible discoloration in eight weeks.Clinical Results: In a double blind clinical study after 4 weeks:- 88% of subjects agreed that their dark spots and sun spots faded after using our serumAfter 2 weeks:- 80% of subjects agreed that their skin tone looks more even after using our serum

Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily ✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is:A quick-absorbing, medicated dry oil to clear congested pores, treat and prevent acne, and smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for clearer, smoother skin. Solutions for:- Acne and blemishes- Blackheads- Pores If you want to know more…With 1.5 percent salicylic acid, this fast-acting, quick-drying, medicated oil clears acne and blackhead-causing buildup and debris from congested pores for smoother, blemish-free skin. Tea tree oil and black cumin seed oil support clear skin, while hexylresorcinol and licorice naturally brighten the appearance of old acne discolorations for a more even-toned complexion. Counterbalancing the potentially drying effects of salicylic acid, milk thistle and cucumber seed oil nourish the skin and smooth the appearance of lines and wrinkles, without leaving a greasy residue. Chamomile and neroli soothe stressed, blemish-prone skin. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates What else you need to know:"When I formulated U.F.O., I wanted to create a dry oil that practically disappears into the skin, leaving oily skin smooth (but never greasy) and yet effectively treated for blemishes and blackheads. Salicylic acid is notoriously over-drying, leaving your skin stripped and looking irritated. By infusing salicylic acid into clarifying oils (like tea tree oil and black cumin seed oil), the drying effects of salicylic acid are nipped in the bud, while all of the treatment aspects (like clearing congested pores and managing blackheads and blemishes) are in full-force. U.F.O. is part of the new Green Line, along with Martian Mattiyfing Melting Water-Gel Toner, created specifically for oily skin clients."-Sunday Riley

p_Name: Rapid Age Spot and Pigment Lightening Serum
p_description: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ DryWhat it is:A serum formulated with two percent hydroquinone to fade the look of dark spots, age spots, and sun spots.Solutions for:- Uneven skin tone - Dullness and uneven textureIf you want to know more… The ultimate dark spot lightening serum is formulated with two percent hydroquinone, the pigment lightener doctors prescribe most. Murad formulates with the highest level available without a prescription. In as little as one week, it fades the look of dark spots, sun spots, age spots, and uneven skin tone. Rapid Age Spot and Pigment Lightening Serum combines hydroquinone with hexapeptide-2, a powerful skin-brightening peptide that helps lighten dark spots and prevent the appearance of future damage for a more even, more radiant skin tone. Exfoliating glycolic acid lifts away dull, dead skin cells and allows active ingredients to penetrate more quickly, so you see spots fade faster and more radiant skin sooner.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: Hydroquinone is the only over-the-counter skin lightener approved by the FDA. For more than 50 years, dermatologists like Dr. Murad have prescribed hydroquinone because of its excellent ability to lighten frustrating dark spots, sun spots, and age spots on all skin tones. Even the most potent skin lightening treatments can be counteracted by UV light, a proven dark spot trigger. That’s why Dr. Murad’s skin lightening prescription always includes a daily SPF, such as City Skin Age Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 50 | PA++++. This vitamin C-boosted, color-correcting mineral SPF for all skin types has a luminous finish that flatters all skin tones.This product is cruelty-free and formulated without gluten.Research results:Clinically tested by an independent laboratory and proven safe for sensitive skin.In just 1 week: - 85% saw spots lighten- 89% noticed improved skin smoothness- 85% noted improved skin radiance- 85% noted improved skin evenness and brightness- 81% improved skin clarity

p_description: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ SensitiveWhat it is:A pore-diminishing gel serum powered by 100 percent natural salicylic acid to address blackheads, pores, breakouts, and excess oil.Solutions for:- Pores- Blemishes- OilinessIf you want to know more… Formulated with the highest concentration of natural salicylic acid, this ultra-light yet potent gel serum purifies pores, zaps blemishes, and purges excess oil, blackheads, and bacteria. Caudalie’s natural salicylic acid (a BHA, or beta hydroxy acid) is clean, powerful, and oil soluble, which allows it to penetrate pores, targeting the most stubborn pimples caused by bacteria and dead skin. While the salicylic acid works hard to flush out excess oil and clarify clogged pores, rosewater works to your enhance glow and hydrate skin. The formula is further enriched with antioxidant grape seed polyphenols to protect the skin and prevent the oil inside your pores from oxidizing, or turning black, which is essentially a blackhead. A complex of noncomedogenic essential oils provides antiseptic benefits to calm the skin and keep it clear, leaving it smooth and soft. Powerful yet soothing, this serum is safe for sensitive skin and is recommended for combination to oily skin, as well as those with hormonal breakouts. What else you need to know:Caudalie recommends using this serum all over the face in the morning and night. It may also be used as a spot treatment for problem areas. The formula is 100 percent fragrance-free, with a scent that comes from natural essential oils.This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.Research results: In a clinical self-evaluation test of 30 volunteers, after 28 days of twice-daily application:- 82% agreed pores look tightenedAfter 2 months:- 81% agreed skin texture looks refined Clean at Sephora When you spot our Clean seal, you can be sure we’ve checked that this brand’s product is made without the ingredients you told us you’d most like to avoid. Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ DryWhat it is:A serum that immediately replenishes the delicate balance that supports a healthy barrier function of skin-like sunshine’s bronzy color, delivered without the damage.Solutions for:- Fine lines and wrinkles- Uneven skin tone- Dullness and uneven textureIf you want to know more… These drops include a chronopeptide that mimics the antioxidant benefits of vitamin D, omega-rich virgin marula, and black currant seed oils, along with vitamin F (fatty acids), to replenish the delicate balance that supports a healthy skin barrier function. "I’m inside most days. I don’t wear foundation, but I really wanted a little something I could mix into my other products to give my skin some color. The problem was I didn’t want to risk a breakout and I couldn’t find one that fit my Suspicious six-free criteria. So, after a few attempts, we landed on a silky, natural-looking, bronzing concentrate. My chemist told me later that they were high-fiving each other in the lab because they had never before been able to create a formulation like this that was silicone-free. D-Bronzi™ is made of vitamins, antioxidants, platinum peptides, and barrier-supportive fatty acids that defend skin from environmental free radicals. It’s a gorgeous sheer bronzer that I formulated with skin health top-of-mind...like sunshine in a bottle without the damage. I hope you fall #drunkinlove!"-Tiffany Masterson, Brand FounderThis product is vegan and 100 percent free of essential oils, fragrance, silicone, and gluten. Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the skin’s health or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulations. They never take into account an ingredient’s synthetic or natural status, but instead choose based on its biocompatibility. You won’t find what Drunk Elephant calls the "Suspicious 6" in their products (essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical screens, fragrance/dyes, and SLS,) making them, in their opinion, appropriate for all skin. They believe that these six ubiquitous ingredients are at the root of almost every skin issue we see. When formulating the products, they focus on pH levels and safety, always making sure that the active ingredients are at efficacious levels. This is the Drunk Elephant difference.Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.
